explains: adj. 不能治愈的；无可救药的
n. 患不治之症者，不能治愈的人

sentences.en: Poor old Willy is an incurable romantic.
sentences.cn: 可怜的老威利是个无可救药的浪漫主义者。

sentences.en: He is suffering from an incurable skin disease.
sentences.cn: 他身患一种无可救治的皮肤病。

sentences.en: A 23-year-old girl with an incurable disease can fly to Alaska and everything can work out.
sentences.cn: 一个患有不治之症的23岁女孩可以飞往阿拉斯加，一切就会得到解决。
